
{{alias}}( μ, c )
    Returns the median of a Lévy distribution with location parameter `μ` and
    scale parameter `c`.

    If provided `NaN` as any argument, the function returns `NaN`.

    If provided `c <= 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    μ: number
        Location parameter.

    c: number
        Scale parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Median.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 0.0, 1.0 )
    ~2.198
    > y = {{alias}}( 4.0, 3.0 )
    ~10.594
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN, 1.0 )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0, NaN )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0, 0.0 )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
